page.title: 11TYPES OF FOOD EATEN IN 1 DAY
page.content:
30 children of 5 or 6 year olds kept a record of each different type of food they ate on one day. The number following the food indicates the percentage of children who ate the particular food that day.
Meat 76% Mushrooms 20% Cereal 66% Cress 20% Pototoes 63% Apples 16% Butter/margarine 53% Peach 13% Chocolate 46% Cheese 13% Baked beans 43% Strawberries 10% Peas 36% Orange 10% Carrots 36% Cauliflower 10% Tomatoes 33% Cherries 6% Fish 30% Bananas 6% Lettuce 26% Pineapple 3% Cabbage 26% Lemon 3%
